about_the_game: Star Jet Alpha is a top-down space shooter inspired by classic arcade games.  This demo shows 5 stages for players to play - 4 + 1 bonus stage.  Each stage is progressively more difficult.  Current version of the demo has Xbox One controller (recommended) and keyboard support.  Multiple gamepad controller and mouse support coming soon!
detailed_description: Star Jet Alpha is a top-down space shooter inspired by classic arcade games.  This demo shows 5 stages for players to play - 4 + 1 bonus stage.  Each stage is progressively more difficult.  Current version of the demo has Xbox One controller (recommended) and keyboard support.  Multiple gamepad controller and mouse support coming soon!
name: Star Jet Alpha Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The game can be played with either a PS4 controller or a keyboard. There are 2 basic controls - turn and fire. The Star Jet is always moving, so all you need to do is turn. Destroy enemy space stations to end the stage.
